title: Throwing King Bob-omb Out of Bounds

media:group.media:title: Throwing King Bob-omb Out of Bounds
media:group.media:description:
I throw King Bob-omb out of bounds. He then falls down until he reaches water at y=-11000, since that's the default value of the water level.

I clip him out of bounds using the elevator platform's walls to push him all the way through the static walls of the course. This was partially inspired by a similar strategy used for HMC Metal-Head Mario Can Move! (https://youtu.be/QSxEhoimzX4). Also, note that simply trying to throw him or drop him while pressed against out of bounds doesn't work, because there's a failsafe that prevents him from being released out of bounds directly.

Update: It seems that Plush already did this one time using a different method: https://youtu.be/CrdAxSy43aA
